description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Mutated Zombies everywhere!!! The experimental drug went awry and started spinning out new breed of zombies.  As the lone commander on ground, help the few stranded scientists to get airlifted.
description.short: Mutated Zombies everywhere!!! The experimental drug went awry and started spinning out new breed of zombies.  As the lone commander on ground, help the few stranded scientists to get airlifted.
